text: Jara to (rasula) tumhala talaka de'una takila tara lavakaraca tyanna, tyanca palanakarta (allaha) tumacya'aivaji tumacyapeksa cangalya patn'ya pradana karila, jya islama (dharma) balaganarya, imana rakhanarya, allahasamora jhukanarya, maphi maganarya, upasana karanarya, roje (vrata) rakhanarya asatila vidhava ani kumarika
